channel.title: Is it safe to...?
channel.description:
Get news from a text file? Just testing things. Is there any possible way someone can open up news.txt and edit it?
http://rspsite.info/hmm.php
I'm getting the news from http://rspsite.info/agreement.txt *smf's*
Should I? Or mysql?

item.title: Is it safe to...?
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

Newty:

mysql is probably more efficiant but text files will work also, and no, nobody can open the text file up and edit it except for you.

Thanks for answering. I don’t know enough PHP yet, i’m still learning so give me a while, just started about a day ago.

Read full topic
